sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar
    id="my-chart-id"
    :options="chartOptions"
    :data="chartData"
    :height="60"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "BarChart",
  components: { Bar },
  data() {
    const generateRandomData = () => {
      const data = [];
      for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) {
        const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 51); // 0부터 50사이의 난수 생성
        data.push(randomNumber);
      }
      return data;
    };

    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: [
          "2023 January",
          "2023 February",
          "2023 March",
          "2023 April",
          "2023 May",
          "2022 June",
          "2022 July",
          "2022 August",
          "2022 September",
          "2022 October",
          "2022 November",
          "2022 December",
        ],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Benign",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "Bot",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "Brute Force -Web",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
          {
            label: "Brute Force -XSS",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "DDOS attack-HOIC",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "DDOS attack-LOIC-UDP",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
          {
            label: "DDoS attacks-LOIC-HTTP",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "DoS attacks-GoldenEye",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "DoS attacks-Hulk",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
          {
            label: "DoS attacks-SlowHTTPTest",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "DoS attacks-Slowloris",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "FTP-BruteForce",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
          {
            label: "Infilteration",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "SQL Injection",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "SSH-Bruteforce",
            data: generateRandomData(),
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true,
        type: "barStacked",
        stacked: true,
        grouped: false,
        scales: {
          x: {
            //position: "top",
          },
        },
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
